title: MentalArena: Self-play Training of Language Models for Diagnosis and Treatment of Mental Health Disorders

abstract: Mental health disorders are one of the most serious diseases in the world. Most people with such a disease lack access to adequate care, which highlights the importance of training models for the diagnosis and treatment of mental health …
